Thanks a lot for Glee.

I saw the first episode of Glee's first season  just a week ago with a friend, & I got hooked. He had the whole season, & I spend the entire weekend watching it. The first place I looked for Season Two was you (you're the best, right!), & I have two requests.

One - Why did you do the first two episodes in 272p instead of 480p? (You did the same thing with Fringe's first two eps, if I remember correctly) If possible, can you do them in 480p?

Two - You made separate torrents for episodes 1-4, & they have decent number of seeders, but for episodes 5-10, that's certainly not the case. Can you seed them for a while?

Hope you don't get too bored with this long message. Thanks! :)

Thanks Fella
Will seed as long as possible of course
@etowhid: My old "home" was closed and I came on TPB right then. And I have 272p fan base at the old place.
I see your point. I wish there were more seeders for episodes 5-10...I'd hate to go to eztv for them; twice the file size = 2x waiting time :(
